mail.accepted-partner-request-subject: {{partnerName}} has accepted your Partner connection request
mail.accepted-partner-request-message: {{partnerName}} has accepted your organization's Partner connection request for one of your requirements. Click below to go to the list of your projects and their requirements.
mail.declined-partner-request-subject: {{partnerName}} has declined your Partner connection request
mail.declined-partner-request-message: {{partnerName}} has declined your Partner connection request for one of your requirements. View your projects list to find a new Partner for that requirement.
mail.sent-partner-request-subject: You have sent a new Partner connection request to {{partnerName}}
mail.sent-partner-request-message1: Your organization has sent a new Partner connection request to {{partnerName}} on one of your requirements. You will be notified once they accept or decline it.
mail.sent-partner-request-message2: Your list of projects and requirements will also reflect whether the Partner request is pending or accepted.
mail.accepted-partner-request-from-subject: You have accepted a Partner connection request from {{clientName}}
mail.accepted-partner-request-from-message: Your organization has accepted a Partner connection request from {{clientName}} for one of their requirements. Find more details in your Requirements tab.
mail.declined-partner-request-from-subject: You have declined a Partner connection request from {{clientName}}
mail.declined-partner-request-from-message: Your organization has declined a Partner connection request from {{clientName}} on one of their requirements. No further action is needed from you. Click below to view a list of any remaining connection requests.
mail.partner-disconnect-client-subject: A client has removed a connection
mail.partner-disconnect-client-message: {{clientName}} has removed their connection with you related to {{initiativeName}} {{projectName}} {{requirementName}} for the following reason:
mail.received-partner-request-subject: Action needed: Accept or decline a new Partner connection request from {{clientName}}
mail.received-partner-request-message1: Your organization has received a new Partner connection request from {{clientName}} for one of their requirements.
mail.received-partner-request-message2: Click below to review and accept or decline the request.
mail.partner-user-added-admin-subject: Action needed: Accept or decline a new partner user
mail.partner-user-added-admin-message1: {{partnerName}} has requested a new user, {{userName}}, be added to the DevvESG platform.
mail.partner-user-added-admin-message2: Please review the request in Admin.
mail.partner-user-approved-admin-subject: A new partner user has been approved
mail.partner-user-approved-admin-message: A new user, {{userName}}, was just approved for the partner organization {{partnerName}}, and they are now active in the DevvESG platform.
mail.partner-user-approved-partner-subject: {{userName}}, Thank you for registering with DevvESG!
mail.partner-user-approved-partner-message: Your access request has been approved! You may now log in to the DevvESG platform.
mail.partner-user-denied-admin-subject: A new partner request was denied
mail.partner-user-denied-admin-message: A new user, {{userName}}, was just denied for {{partnerName}}. They will not be notified, and they will not be able to access the DevvESG platform.
mail.password-reset-message1: To reset your password, visit the following link:
mail.password-reset-message2: If you did not request this password reset, no action is required at this time.
